installCommand: npm install -g npm@11.6.2 --legacy-peer-deps && npm install @babel/core@^7.0.0 --legacy-peer-deps &&  npm install @react@^17.0.0 --legacy-peer-deps &&  npm install @babel/plugin-syntax-flow@^7.14.5 --legacy-peer-deps &&  npm install @babel/plugin-transform-react-jsx@^7.14.9 --legacy-peer-deps && npm install typescript@>= 2.7 --legacy-peer-deps  &&  npm install typescript@>= 3.7.0-beta --legacy-peer-deps
